attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: REQUEST THAT ALL PENSIONERS . WHO LEFT ENGLAND BEFORE THE START OF THE WINTER FUEL PAYMENT . SHOULD BE ENTITLED TO THE HEATING ALLOWANCE PAYMENT, TO SAY THAT BECAUSE WE LEFT BEFORE ITS INTRODUCTION, WE ARE THEREFORE NOT ENTITLED TO PAYMENT IS GROSSLY UNFAIR ESPECIALLY WHEN WE TOO HAVE SPENT OUR WORKING LIVES PAYING INTO THE BRITISH TAX SYSTEM .

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
